content: **ps ⭐️ i m a season 8 knit star ⭐️ shop this season s masterclasses $20 off during the early bird sales window april 21-30 here 1 ** a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here 2 the summer league cutoff is a crewneck raglan tee that evokes memories of summer sports and a general sense of nostalgia the doubled ribbed neckband v-insert neck triangle and rolled hems give personality and add to the classic appeal of this sweatshirt-inspired wardrobe staple meant to be well-loved and well-worn this cutoff has the perfect broken-in relaxed fit that allows for chic comfort and wearable ease shop the full kit here 3 **sizes** xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl suggested ease 4-6 /10-15cm pictured in size s on model with 34 /86 5cm bust **finished dimensions** bust circumference 34 25 38 75 42 25 46 75 50 25 54 75 60 64 5 /87 98 107 118 5 127 5 139 152 5 163 5 cm length 18 25 19 19 75 20 5 21 75 22 5 23 5 24 5 /46 5 48 50 52 5 55 57 5 59 5 62 5 cm **difficulty level** intermediate **skills** the knit stitch purl stitch m1r m1l traveling stitches working in the round picking up and knitting stitches mattress stitch seaming all patterns are written in standard us terms sign up for info on special offers sales and new pattern releases bit ly/townewsletter **connect** instagram @twoofwands facebook facebook com/twoofwands pinterest pinterest
